templateValue.title: Supplier Registration Invitation - {{currentLoopObj.schAssociateNumber}}
templateValue.company: Emirates Steel Arkan Supplier Assurance Team
templateValue.emailBody1: Emirates Steel Arkan Supplier Management Team has invited you to register to become a supplier with Emirates Steel Arkan. The below set-up is mandatory to include 'Company Name' in Emirates Steel Arkan Online purchasing process, hence you need to initiate at the earliest to allow registration & sourcing enablement:
templateValue.emailBody2: 1. Setup Online account using the below link and Credential details.
templateValue.emailBody3: 2. Fill in Emirates Steel Arkan Registration questionnaire : Provide company data uploading Trade license/Certificates/Bank details, etc.
templateValue.emailBody5: ESA will review & you will receive an auto-notification after internal approval.
templateValue.emailBody6: Only follow up for registration status updates after completing the Online Portal set-up, any further queries, you may contact ESSupplier@emiratessteel.com
templateValue.footer2: Emirates Steel Arkan Supplier Assurance Team

templateValue.title: Supplier OnBoarding Invitation
templateValue.company: Emirates Steel Arkan Supplier Assurance Team
templateValue.emailBody: Welcome to Emirates Steel Arkan Supplier Management,We are transforming our Supply Chain Management to the new SCH Platform. As a Registered Emirates Steel Arkan Supplier, you are invited to login to your new account and review your profile.
templateValue.emailBody1: For future login to access ESA RFQ/PO, save credentials & SCH link :  https://sch.emiratessteel.com/
templateValue.footer1: Emirates Steel Arkan Supplier Assurance Team

templateValue.title: Supplier Registration Invitation - {{payload.selectedRow['Supplier ID']['text']}}
templateValue.company: Emirates Steel Arkan Supplier Assurance Team
templateValue.emailBody1: Emirates Steel Arkan Supplier Management Team has invited you to register to become a supplier with Emirates Steel Arkan. The below set-up is mandatory to include 'Company Name' in Emirates Steel Arkan Online purchasing process, hence you need to initiate at the earliest to allow registration & sourcing enablement:
templateValue.emailBody2: 1. Setup Online account using the below link and Credential details.
templateValue.emailBody3: 2. Fill in Emirates Steel Arkan Registration questionnaire : Provide company data uploading Trade license/Certificates/Bank details, etc.
templateValue.emailBody5: ESA will review & you will receive an auto-notification after internal approval.
templateValue.emailBody6: Only follow up for registration status updates after completing the Online Portal set-up, any further queries, you may contact ESSupplier@emiratessteel.com
templateValue.footer2: Emirates Steel Arkan Supplier Assurance Team

templateValue.emailBody1: Emirates Steel (ESA) Arkan Supply Assurance team is sending this notification to remind your good company that the following document is going to expire :
templateValue.emailBody2: The updated document needs to be uploaded into your XXXX , maintained under section XXXX using Link: XXX,In case you have already submitted please ignore this mail.Failure to keep the Ariba profile updated will result in your Emirates Steel Arkan account being deactivated. If deactivated, your Company will be excluded from any future RFQs and POs.
